name: Student's health record
text: §302A-1160  Student's health record.  The department of education shall provide student health record forms for immunization and physical examination to the schools, private physicians, advanced practice registered nurses, and authorized personnel of the department of health. [L 1996, c 89, pt of §2; am L 1998, c 60, §5; am L 2000, c 109, §4]
